juzs.text: About what do they ask one another
About the great news
concerning which they disagree
No, they will come to know
Again, no, they will come to know
Did We not make the earth habitable
and the mountains pegs
And We created you in pairs
And We made your sleep for rest
And We made the night a covering
And We made the day (for earning) livelihood
And We built above you seven strong ones
And We made (the sun) a burning lamp
And We sent down from the rain-clouds, torrential rain
that We may bring forth through it grain and vegetation
and dense gardens
The day of decision is certainly fixed
The day it will be blown into the trumpet (or structure of the universe) you will come forth in groups
And the sky will be opened so that it will become gates
and the mountains will be moved away, so that they will become like flowing sand
Hell certainly lies in wait
a home for the rebellious
They will stay in it for ages
They will taste therein neither coolness nor drink
except boiling water and pus
a reward proportional (to their sins)
They certainly did not hope that they would have to account for (their evil deeds)
and they denied Our signs with a denial
and We have computed everything in a record
So taste (the punishment), and We will not increase for you anything except punishment
For those who guard (against evil there) is certainly an achievement
Gardens and vineyards
and young women of equal age
and a full cup
They will hear therein neither useless talk nor falsehood
Reward from your Lord, a gift (for the) account (of good deeds)
The Lord of the skies and the earth and that which is between them, the Beneficent, they will not be able to address Him
The day the spirit (Gabriel) and the angels stand in ranks, they will not speak, except the one who is permitted by the Beneficent and he speaks aright
That's a real day (not fictitious), so whoever wills let him seek a home near his Lord
We warn you of a punishment that is near, the day man will see that which his hands had sent forth and the disbeliever will say, “I wish I were dust.”
By those who pull out getting drowned (going deep to the last limit)
and those who untie, releasing
and those who are busy moving swiftly
then those who are ahead, being ahead
then those who manage the affair
On the day the quaking one (the earth) will quake
and the succeeding one will follow it
on that day hearts will palpitate
their looks will be cast down
They say, “Shall we be restored to our first state
even when we have become rotten bones?”
They say, “Then this would be a return of loss.”
So it will only be a single shout
when they will be awake
Has the story of Moses come to you
When his Lord called him in the holy valley of Tuwa (saying)
Go to Pharaoh, he has certainly rebelled
then say to him, “ Have you the inclination to purify yourself
and that I should guide you to your Lord, so that you fear (Him)?”
Then he showed him the great sign
but he denied and disobeyed
then he turned away in haste
then he gathered to proclaim
then said, “I am your top most Lord.”
So God caught him for punishment (both in) the later and the former (life)
There is certainly a lesson in that for one who fears
Are you the stronger in creation or the sky which He built
He raised its height and then set it in equilibrium
And He darkened its night and brought out its day light
And He stretched out the earth (drifting the continents apart), after that
brought out from the (earth) its water and its pasture
and He firmly anchored the mountains
A provision for you and for your cattle
So when the great predominating calamity comes
the day man will recollect what he earnestly strove after
And the hell will be made manifest for him who sees
So as for him who rebelled
and preferred the life of this world
then hell will certainly be his home
And as for him who feared to stand before his Lord and restrained himself from evil desire
then the garden will certainly be his home
They ask you about the hour of doom, “When will be its anchorage (time of happening) ?”
In what way are you to discuss it
To your Lord (belongs the knowledge of) the ultimate time of its happening
You are a warner only for him who fears it
The day they see it, for them it will be as if they had not stayed (in their graves or this world) except for an evening or a morning of it
He (Muhammad) frowned and turned his back
that the blind man came to him
And what will make you realize that he might have purified himself
or be reminded, so that (your) reminding might have profited him
As for him who is carefree (wealthy)
to him then, you pay attention
And if he does not purify himself, the responsibility is not on you
And as for him who comes to you striving hard
and he fears
from him you are distracted
No, it is certainly a reminder
so whoever wills let him remember it
(It is) in pages honoured
elevated, clean
in the hands of writers
honoured, virtuous
Perished be man, how ungrateful he is
From what thing did He create him
He created him from a sperm, then programmed him (to follow a certain path)
then, He eased that path for him
Then He causes him to die then buries him
Then, when He wills, He will raise him
No, he has not done that which He commanded him to do
So let man look at his food
How We pour water in the form of rain
then We split the earth, (with) a splitting
then We cause to grow therein, grain
and grapes and green fodder
and olive trees and date palms
and dense gardens
and fruits and herbage
A provision for you and for your cattle
Then when the deafening sound comes
(it will be) a day when man will run away from his brother
and his mother and his father
and his wife and his sons
on that day, for everyone of them there will be enough concern to keep him unconcerned with others
(Some) faces on that day will be bright
laughing, rejoicing at the good news
(while other) faces on that day will have dust over them
being covered with darkness
Those are the disbelievers, the transgressors
When the sun is made to wind up
and when the stars become hazy
and when the mountains are moved away
and when camels with ten months' pregnancy are left off
and when wild animals are brought together
and when the oceans are flooded
and when the souls are paired (probably with their respective bodies)
and when the female child buried alive is asked
for what sin she was killed
and when the pages are spread
and when the sky has its covering removed
and when the hell is kindled
and when the garden is brought near
(every) soul (everyone) will know what (deeds) it has brought for presentation
So I do swear by those that withdraw
those that move swiftly, hiding
and the night when it comes (and goes)
and the morning when it breathes (and makes us conscious)
it is certainly the word of an honoured messenger (Gabriel)
possessor of power, established in the presence (of God) to Whom belongs the throne
one to be obeyed, and with it trustworthy
And your companion (Muhammad) is not possessed by jinn
And he (Muhammad) saw him (Gabriel) on the clear horizon
And he is not a miser concealing (information) of the unseen
And it is not the word of the cursed devil
So in' which direction are you all going
The (Quran) is nothing but a reminder to the worlds
for him among you who wills to be upright
And you do not will unless God, the Lord of the worlds, wills
When the sky is cleft asunder
and when the planets are made to fall
and when the oceans are made to overflow
and when the graves are overturned
(every) soul will know what it had advanced (preferred) and what it had kept behind (not preferred)
O man ! what has deceived you concerning your Honoured Lord
Who created you, then set the equilibrium in you so as to balance you
In whatever form He willed, He constituted you
No, but you deny the (day of) judgment
And certainly over you are custodians
honoured recorders
they know what you do
The righteous will certainly be in bliss
And the transgressors will certainly be in hell
They will enter it on the day of judgment
and they will not be absent from it
And what will make you realize what the day of judgment is
Again, what will make you realize what the day of judgment is
The day on which no soul (person) will have any power on another soul (person), and the command on that day will be (totally) God’s
Sorrowful is the state of those who measure and weigh less than what is due
those who, when they take by measure from other people, they take in full
but when they measure or weigh for others, they make it less than what is due
Do they not expect that they will be raised (after their death)
for a great day
the day mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds
No, certainly the record of (deeds) of the transgressors will be in Sijjin
And what will make you realize what Sijjin is
(It is a) written record
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
who deny the day of judgment
And no one denies it except every exceeder of limits, a sinner
When Our signs are read to him, he says, “Ancient stories.”
No, but that which they have earned is rust on their hearts
No, on that day they will certainly be curtained from their Lord
then they will certainly enter the hell
then it will be said, “This is that which you made a denial of.”
No, certainly the record of (deeds of) the righteous will be in Illiyin
and what will make you realize what Illiyun is
(It is a) written record
Those who are brought near will witness it
The righteous will certainly be in bliss
They will be seeing (reclining) on couches
You will recognize in their faces, radiance of bliss
They will be given to drink from a pure drink, sealed
The seal of which is of musk. So let those who wish to put in conscious effort, put in a conscious effort for that
And it is admixed with Tasniim
a spring from which those who are brought near will drink
The criminals certainly used to laugh at those who believed
and when they passed by them they used to wink at one another
And when they returned to their class of people, they returned joyful in false pride
And when they saw them they said, “These are certainly the persons who are astray,”
though they were not sent as custodians over them
So this day, those who had believed will laugh at the disbelievers
They will be seeing (reclining) on couches
Will not the disbelievers be rewarded according to what they used to do
When the sky is split asunder
and responds to its Lord, a duty incumbent on it
And when the earth is stretched out
and casts forth that which is in it and becomes empty
and responds to its Lord, a duty incumbent on it
O man! you are certainly labouring towards your Lord, with a labour, so you will meet Him
So as for him who is given his record (of deeds) in his right hand
he will be called to account, with an easy accountability
and he will return happily to his class of people
And as for him who is given his record (of deeds) behind his back
he will call for (i.e. invoke) destruction (upon himself)
and he will enter the (hot) blaze
He was certainly happy in his class of people (in the worldly life)
He certainly thought that he would never return
Why not, his Lord was certainly seeing him
So I do swear by the redness of the sunset
and the night and that which it gathers
and the moon when it is full
You will definitely be carried from stage to stage
So what is wrong with them that they do not believe
And when the Quran is, recited to them, they do not prostrate
No, those who do not believe, deny
And God knows best what they hide
So give them the news of the painful punishment
except those who believe and do righteous works, for them there is an unfailing reward
By the sky containing galaxies of stars
and the promised day
and the witness and the witnessed
Be killed owners of the pit
(of) the fire containing fuel
when they sat around it
And they were (themselves) witnesses over that which they did with the believers
And they did not avenge them except (for the fact) that they believed in God, the Mighty, the Praised
Whose is the kingdom of the skies and the earth, and God is a Witness over everything
Those who persecute the believing men and the believing women then do not repent, then certainly for them is the punishment of hell and for them is the punishment of burning
Those who believe and do righteous works, certainly, for them are the gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great achievement
The grip of your Lord is certainly strong
It is certainly He Who causes to begin (originates) and causes to repeat (reproduces)
And He is Protectively Forgiving, the Loving
Possessor of the glorious throne
Doer of what He intends
Has there come to you the story of the armies of
Pharaoh and Thamud
No, those who do not believe are in falsehood
and God encompasses them from every side (without their notice)
No, it is a glorious Quran
in a guarded tablet
By the sky and the Taariq
And what will make you realize what Taariq is
(It is) the piercing star
There is not a single soul which does not have a custodian over it
So let man see from what he was created
He was created from gushing water (fluid)
that comes out from in between the loins and the ribs
He is certainly able to return him, (and make him face)
the day, (when) secrets will be examined
then there will neither be strength nor a helper for him
By the sky that returns (the water in the form of rain)
and the earth that splits (due to vegetation)
this (Quran) is certainly a decisive statement
and it is not (something to be taken as) a joke
They certainly plot a plot
and I (too) plot a plot
So give time to the disbelievers, give them time for a while
Glorify the name of your Lord, the Most High
Who created then set the equilibrium
and Who programmed then guided (to the programme)
And Who brought forth the pasture
then made it dust coloured rubbish
We will make you recite, so that you will not forget
except that which God wills, He certainly knows the manifest and (also) that which is hidden
And We will make your (way) easy for the easy (way)
So remind, if reminding is profitable
he who fears will be reminded
and he who is unfortunate will turn away from it
he who will enter the great fire
then he will neither die therein nor live
He succeeds who purifies himself
and remembers the name of his Lord, then worships (offers salat)
No, you prefer the life of this world
while the hereafter is better and that which remains
This is certainly there in the earlier books (too)
books of lbrahim and Moses
Have the details of the happenings on the (day of the final) covering come to you
Faces on that day will be downcast
labouring, weary
entering very hot fire
being made to drink from boiling spring
There will be no food for them except that from the thorn tree
It will neither be nourishable by them nor will it make them free from hunger
(Other) faces that day will be happy
pleased on account of the effort they had put in earlier
(They will be) in a high garden
therein you will not hear useless talk
therein is a flowing spring
therein are raised couches
and drinking cups placed ready (for use)
and cushions set in rows
and carpets spread
So do they not see towards the camel how it is created
and towards the sky how it is raised
and towards the mountains how they are rooted
and towards the earth how it is spread
So remind, you are only to remind
You are not in authority over them
But one who turns away and does not believe
so he will be punished by God with a great punishment
Their return is certainly towards Us
then certainly, it is on Us to take their account
By the dawn
and the ten nights
and the even and the odd
and the night when it travels
For one who has sense, these (items) are surely worth being sworn by
Did you not see how your Lord dealt with Aad
people of Iram, possessors of (lofty buildings supported by) pillars
the like of which was not created in (other) cities
and Thamud who cut the rocks in the valley
and Pharaoh, possessor of pegs
who rebelled in the cities
Thus they increased corruption in them
So your Lord poured on them a portion of the punishment
Your Lord is certainly watchfully waiting
So as for man, whenever his Lord tries him by honouring him and favouring him, then he says, “My Lord has honoured me.”
And as for (the situation) when He tries him by straitening on him his provision, he says, “My Lord has disgraced me.”
No, but the orphan is not honoured by you
and you do not urge one another on the feeding of the poor
and you eat off the inheritance, eating it greedily
and you love wealth with intense love
No, when the earth is crushed to level it in a level
and your Lord comes with the angels in rank after rank
so on that day, hell will be brought near, (and) on that day man will be mindful. But his being mindful (on that day) will be of no use to him
He will say, "I wish I had sent (good deeds) before, for my life (after death)
So on that day, no one’s punishment will be like His punishment
and no one's binding will be like His binding
O you peaceful soul
Return to your Lord pleased and pleasing (Him)
so enter among My servants
and enter My garden
No, I do swear by this city (Mecca)
and you are a dweller of this city
and by the begetter (father) and that which he begot (son)
We have indeed created man in hardship
Does he think that no one will ever have power over him
He says, “I have destroyed plenty of wealth.”
Does he think that no one sees him
Did We not make for him two eyes
and a tongue and two lips
and show him the two high ways (of good and evil)
But he did not attempt the uphill (road)
And what will make you realize what the uphill (road) is
Freeing a slave
or feeding during a period of hunger
an orphan having relationship
or the dusty poor
then to be among those who believe and recommend to each other patience and recommend to each other compassion
Those are the companions of the right hand (side)
And those who do not believe in Our signs, they are the companions of the left hand (side)
Fire will be closed over them (enveloping them from all sides)
By the sun and its light
and the moon when it reflects it
and the day when it unveils it
and the night when it covers it
and the sky and Him Who built it
and the earth and Him Who spread it
and the soul and Him Who balanced it
then inspired in it, its transgressions and its guarding (against evils)
He indeed succeeds who purifies it
and he indeed fails who buries it
Thamud denied (the truth) due to their rebellion
when the most wretched of them broke forth
The messenger of God told them, “It is the she-camel of God, so let her drink.”
But they denied him and slaughtered her so their Lord destroyed them due to their sin and thus balanced it (the destruction was equal to their crime)
And He does not fear its consequence
By the night when it covers (the sun)
and the day when it unveils (the sun)
and Him Who created the male and the female
Your striving is certainly for diverse ends
So as for him who gave and guarded (against evil)
and accepted that which was best
We will facilitate him for ease
And as for him who was niggardly and considered himself independent
and denied that which was best
We will facilitate him for difficulty
And his wealth will not keep him safe from difficulty when he perishes
It is certainly on Us to guide
And certainly, Ours is the latter (future) and the former (past)
So I warn you of the blazing fire
None will enter it except the wretched
who denied and turned away
And one who guards (against evil) will be saved from it
he who gives his wealth for his self purification
and he does not bestow favour on anyone, from that which is with him, (with the intention of) being rewarded (back)
but he seeks the Attention of his Lord, the High
And he will surely be pleased
By the brightness of the day
and the night when it darkens
Your Lord has neither forsaken you nor does he hate you
And surely the latter period (future) will be better for you than the former (past)
And surely you will be given (so much) by your Lord that you will be pleased
Did He not find you an orphan, then give you shelter
and find you wandering then guide you
and find you poor then make you free of want
So as for the orphan do not oppress (him)
and as for the beggar do not drive him away
and as for the favour of your Lord, do proclaim
Did We not expand for you your bosom
and relieve you of your burden
which weighed down your back
and exalted for you your mention
So certainly with difficulty is ease
Certainly with difficulty is ease
So when you are free, then strive
and turn your attention towards your Lord
By the fig (or the place Tiin where Noah’s ship embarked), and the olive (or Zaita in Jerusalam, were Jesus received and preached the message of God)
and Mount Sinai (where Moses received the message of God)
and this city of security (Mecca, where our prophet Muhammad initially received and preached the message of God, all these are witnesses that)
We had indeed created man in the best form
then We brought him back as the lowest of those who are low
except those who believed and did righteous works, then for them there is an unfailing reward
Then after this what makes you deny the judgment
Is not God the Best Judge, of all the judges
Recite in the name of your Lord Who created
He created man from something that clings and hangs (like a leech)
Recite, and your Lord is the Most Honourable
Who taught with the pen
He taught man that which he did not know
No, man certainly rebels
because he sees himself independent
Certainly, towards your Lord is the return
Have you seen him who forbids
when a servant of God worships
Have you seen, if he is on guidance
or enjoins guarding (against evil)
Have you seen, if he denies and turns (his back)
did he not know that God certainly sees
No, if he does not stop, We will drag him, seizing him by his forelock
the denying, sinful forelock
So let him call his council
We will call the soldiers (guards of hell)
No, do not obey him but prostrate and draw near (to God)
We certainly sent it(Quran) down during the night of Al Qadr
And what will make you realize what the night of Al Qadr is
The night of Al Qadr is better than a thousand months
The angels and the spirit come down during this night by the permission of their Lord with (a programme for) every affair
Peace! it is till the appearance of dawn
Those who do not believe from among the owners of the book and the polytheists would not have left off (falsehood) till the clear proof had come to them (in the form of)
a messenger from God, reading clean pages
containing established ordinances
And those who were given the book did not become divided except after the clear proof came to them

And they were not ordered anything except that they should serve God, keeping religion exclusively for Him, being those who stand firm on that which is right, and (that they should) establish worship (salat) and give charity (zakat), and that is the established religion
Those who do not believe from among the owners of the book and the polytheists will certainly be in the fire of hell, staying therein, those are the persons who are the worst of creatures
Those who believe and do righteous works those certainly are the persons who are the best of creatures

Their reward is with their Lord: Gardens of everlasting bliss, underneath which rivers flow, they will stay therein for ever, God pleased with them and they pleased with Him. That is for him who fears his Lord
When the earth is quaked with its quaking
and the earth brings out its weighty material
and man will say, “What ails her ?”
She will be made to tell her news on that day
because your Lord (would have) communicated to her
On that day human beings will be brought forth in diverse groups, to be shown their deeds
So whoever does good equivalent in weight, even to a small particle, will see it
And whoever does evil equivalent in weight, even to a small particle, will see it
By those that move fast breathing heavily
then those that strike fire striking
then those that raid at dawn
then thereby raise dust
then penetrate into the midst of an assembly
Man is certainly ungrateful to his Lord
and he himself is a witness over that
And he certainly has intense love for good (worldly wealth)
Then does he not know, that when that which is in the graves is exposed
and that which is in the bosoms is made to appear (i.e. secrets are revealed)
certainly on that day, their Lord is fully informed about them
The calamity
What is the calamity
And what will make you realize what the calamity is? (It will befall on)
the day when mankind will be like scattered moths
and the mountains will be like loosened wool
Then as for him whose weights (of good deeds) are heavy
then he will lead a life of pleasure
And as for him whose weights (of good deeds) are light
then his home* will be in a deep pit (of hell)
And what will make you realize what the (deep pit of hell) is
(It is a) very hot fire
Rivalry in worldly increase distracts you (from the remembrance of God)
till you come to the graves
No, you will know
Again, no, you will know
No, if you know (having) the knowledge that is certain
you will definitely see hell fire
Then you will definitely see it with the eye of certainty
Then on that day you will definitely be questioned about the comforts
By the time (i.e. historic time is witness that)
Man is certainly at a loss
except those who believe and do righteous works and recommend to one another, the truth, and recommend to one another, patience
Sorrowful is the state of every slanderer, defamer
who accumulates wealth and keeps on counting it
He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal
No, he will definitely be flung into the crushing one
And what will make you realize what the crushing one is
(It is the) fire of God, kindled
which is made to rise over the hearts
it will certainly be closed on them
in columns that are stretched
Did you not consider, how your Lord dealt with the owners of the elephant
Did He not make their plot useless
and send on them flocks of flying creatures
who pelted them with stones of baked clay
so that He made them like eaten up straw (husk)
For the taming of Quraysh
their taming in equipping caravans (for traveling) in winter and summer
so let them serve the Lord of this house (Kaaba)
Who has fed them in hunger and given them security from fear
Did you see him who belies religion
Then he is the one who pushes away the orphan
and does not urge on the feeding of the poor
So sorrowful is the state of the worshippers
who are heedless of their worship (salat)
(in the sense that they are) those who make a show (of their worship)
and refuse small kindness
We certainly gave you abundance
so worship your Lord and sacrifice
The one who hates you, he is certainly without posterity
Say, “O disbelievers
I do not serve (worship) that which you serve (worship)
And you are not servers of that which I serve
And I am not a server of that which you serve
And you are not servers of that which I serve
For you your religion (or judgment) and for me my religion (or judgment).”
When God's help and the victory comes
and you see people enter the religion of God in troops
then glorify your Lord by praising Him and seek His protective forgiveness. He is certainly the Accepter of repentance
May the hands of Abu Lahab perish. And may he perish
His wealth and that which he earned will not save him
He will enter flaming fire
and his wife (too who is a) carrier of fire-wood
In her neck (there will be) a rope of palm-fibre
Say, “God is One
God is He on Whom all depend
He does not beget and He is not begotten
And there is no one equal to Him.”
Say, “I seek the protection of the Lord of the day break
from the evil of that which He has created
and from the evil of the darkness (of night) when it overspreads
and from the evil of women blowing in the knots (practicing witchcraft)
and from the evil of the envier when he envies.”
Say, “I seek the protection of the Lord of mankind
the King of mankind
the God of mankind
from the evil of the whisperings of (the devil), he who (whispers and then) withdraws
who whispers into the bosoms (hearts or minds) of mankind
from among the jinn and mankind.”
